::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ncdc_temp <- read_csv('https://bcdanl.github.io/data/ncdc_temp_cleaned.csv')
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
date_selected <- as.Date(c("0000-01-01", "0000-04-01",
                                            "0000-07-01",
                                            "0000-10-01",
                                            "0000-12-31"
                                            ))
df <- filter(ncdc_temp, date %in% date_selected)
p <- ggplot(data = ncdc_temp,
            mapping = 
              aes( x = date,
                   y = temperature ) )

p + geom_line( aes( color = location ),show.legend = F) +
  geom_point(data = df) +
  labs(x = "month") +
  scale_x_date(breaks = date_selected,
               date_labels = "%b")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](ggplot-basic_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
p_1 <- ggplot(data = ncdc_temp,
            mapping = 
              aes(x = temperature, 
                  y = month))
p_1 + geom_boxplot(
  fill = "grey"
) + 
  labs(x = NULL) + 
  coord_flip()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](ggplot-basic_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggridges)

p <- ggplot(data = ncdc_temp,
            mapping = 
              aes(x = temperature, 
                  y = month))
p + geom_density_ridges(alpha = 0.3, fill = "blue")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](ggplot-basic_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
cars <- mtcars

c<- ggplot(cars, aes(disp, mpg)) +
        geom_point(aes(color = hp))
c + labs(x= "displacement")+ labs(y= "fuel efficiency")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](ggplot-basic_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
popgrowth_df <- read_csv(
  'https://bcdanl.github.io/data/popgrowth.csv')

popgrowth_df %>% arrange(popgrowth, state)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

:::

```{.r .cell-code}
pg<- ggplot(popgrowth_df, aes(state, popgrowth, fill = region)) +
        geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = "dodge") +
        coord_flip()

pg + labs(y= "population growth 2000 to 2010")+ labs(x= "reorder state, pop growth")
```

![](ggplot-basic_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672}
:::
